data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 58,231 believers in the county of Xining to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xining, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Xining. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Xining, Qinghai, China to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Xining, Qinghai, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Xining.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 767,600 people living in Xining.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xining, Qinghai, China has a population of 767,600.

We estimate Xining has 58,231 people who might know Jesus, 12,401 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 696,969 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Xining a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
